mapper.update: update t_sys_permission set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moduleid = #{moduleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mustneed = #{mustneed,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, moduleid, url, `type`, mustneed from t_sys_permission

SELECT tcsp.id,tcsp.name,tcsp.url,tcsp.moduleid,tsm.moduleName,tcsp.type FROM T_SYS_PERMISSION tcsp LEFT JOIN T_SYS_MODULE tsm ON tcsp.moduleid = tsm.id WHERE 1=1
AND tsm.moduleName=#{mNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tcsp.id IN (SELECT rp.permissionid FROM T_SYS_ROLEPERMS rp LEFT JOIN T_SYS_ROLE cs ON rp.roleid=cs.id WHERE cs.role=#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
or tcsp.mustneed=1

SELECT p.*,(select moduleName from T_SYS_MODULE where id=p.moduleid) as modulename From T_SYS_PERMISSION p WHERE p.id in (SELECT rp.permissionid FROM T_SYS_ROLEPERMS rp WHERE rp.roleid =#{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}) or p.mustneed=1 order by modulename

SELECT p.*,tcs.modulename From T_SYS_PERMISSION p LEFT JOIN T_SYS_MODULE tcs on p.moduleid=tcs.id WHERE p.id not in (SELECT rp.permissionid FROM T_SYS_ROLEPERMS rp WHERE rp.roleid =#{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}) ORDER BY mustneed DESC, url ASC ,moduleid ASC

SELECT distinct url From T_SYS_PERMISSION p
WHERE p.url like #{fastSearch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
